- 19% for nighttime curfews

- 35% for travel quarantine
- 40% for masks

(Thread) A decade ago, Brazil seemed destined to flourish. In 2009, the cover of @TheEconomist showed Rio de Janeiro's Christ the Redeemer statue taking off like a rocket. 

What happened?

My special report in this week's @TheEconomist offers answers: https://t.co/CXwdMjc9or https://t.co/IbSjrlBWit
